generated_body: The article likely reports on a tragic incident in New Jersey where a Porsche vehicle crashed into the second story of a building, resulting in the deaths of two individuals. Readers can expect a detailed account of the circumstances surrounding the crash, including any available information on the victims, the response from emergency services, and possible causes of the accident. The article may also provide insights into the impact of such incidents on public safety and traffic regulations in the area, contributing to a broader discussion about vehicle-related accidents in urban settings.
